title: See the Smithsonian's collection of museums, galleries, gardens and National Zoo
description: As the world's largest museum and research complex, the Smithsonian has plenty of museums, galleries, gardens and more to offer visitors.
content:
See the Smithsonian's collection of museums, galleries, gardens and National Zoo

The Smithsonian is the world’s largest museum complex, with 21 museums and the National Zoo scattered throughout Washington D.C., Virginia and New York, according to the institution. Eleven museums are located along the National Mall, six others and the Smithsonian’s National Zoo are nearby in Washington, D.C, and two are in New York City. Take a look at the historic architecture and artworks throughout all of the Smithsonian's iconic buildings.



Here is the Smithsonian's National Museum of the American Indian which opened in Washington, D.C., on Sept. 21, 2004. Thousands of indigenous peoples gathered in traditional dress to see the opening of the first international institution of living cultures dedicated to the shared native heritage of North, Central and South America. Jason Reed, REUTERS

The glass canopy designed by renowned architects Foster + Partners in the courtyard between the Smithsonian's National Portrait Gallery and the Smithsonian American Art Museum in Washington, D.C. Kevin Lamarque, REUTERS

The space shuttle orbiter Discovery on display at the Udvar-Hazy Smithsonian National Air and Space Annex Museum in Chantilly, Virginia. Gary Cameron, REUTERS

The Smithsonian's National Air and Space Museum Udvar-Hazy Center in Chantilly, Virginia. The Red Arrows are the Royal Air Force’s premier acrobatic team and toured in the U.S. and Canada in 2019. Mark Wilson, Getty Images

The Contemplative Court is seen at the Smithsonian's National Museum of African American History and Culture in Washington, D.C. KEVIN WURM, REUTERS

Performers with the African Heritage Dancers and Drummers hold a Kwanzaa celebration hosted by the Smithsonian Anacostia Community Museum at Fort Stanton Recreation Center in Washington, D.C. in 2017. SAUL LOEB, AFP Via Getty Images

A view of the Smithsonian's Renwick Gallery in Washington, D.C. The Renwick is the Smithsonian's museum dedicated to crafts and decorative arts. Jonathan Ernst, REUTERS

"Truth is Beauty" by March Cochrane" is seen during a preivew of the No Spectators: The Art of Burning Man exhibition at the Renwick Gallery in Washington, D.C. on March 29, 2018. MANDEL NGAN, AFP Via Getty Images

Completed in 1855 and made from Seneca red sandstone, the Smithsonian Institution Building, or "Castle," stands on the National Mall. Chip Somodevilla, Getty Images

Framed by the archway on the north side of the Smithsonian "Castle," the National Museum of Natural History stands directly across the National Mall in Washington, D.C. Chip Somodevilla, Getty Images
summary: The Smithsonian is the world's largest museum complex, with 21 museums and the National Zoo scattered throughout Washington D.C., Virginia, and New York. Eleven museums are located along the National Mall, six others and the Smithsonian’s National Zoo are nearby in Washington, D., and two are in New York City. The Smithsonian's National Museum of the American Indian opened in 2004, with the first institution dedicated to the shared native heritage of North, Central and South America. The historic architecture and artworks throughout the Smithsonian's iconic buildings are seen.
shortSummary: The Smithsonian, with 21 museums and the National Zoo, is the world's largest museum complex, boasting notable collections like Beethys, Beethies, and even the Red Arrows.
argos_summary: The Smithsonian is the largest museum complex in the world, featuring 21 museums and the National Zoo across Washington D.C., Virginia, and New York. Notable sites include the National Museum of the American Indian, the National Air and Space Museum, and the National Museum of African American History and Culture. The complex showcases a variety of historic architecture and artworks, emphasizing the cultural heritage of diverse communities.
